pkgmetadata.longdescription: Partitioning R2 in GLMMs // Partitioning the R2 of GLMMs into variation explained by each predictor and combination of predictors using semi-partial (part) R2 and inclusive R2. Methods are based on the R2 for GLMMs described in Nakagawa Schielzeth (2013) doi:10.1111/j.2041-210x.2012.00261.x and Nakagawa, Johnson Schielzeth (2017) doi:10.1098/rsif.2017.0213.
